title: How to Change the Theme in Windows 10

steps.headline: Open the Personalization settings.
steps.description: Right-click an empty spot on the desktop. and select Personalize.

steps.headline: Select a theme.
steps.description: Click or tap a theme under "Apply a theme".

steps.headline: Follow the link to download more themes from the Windows Store.
steps.description: Select the "Get more themes in the Store" link right under the "Apply a theme" header.

text: Open the Personalization settings. Right-click an empty spot on the desktop. and select Personalize. Select Themes from the sidebar.  Select a theme. Click or tap a theme under "Apply a theme". Follow the link to download more themes from the Windows Store. Select the "Get more themes in the Store" link right under the "Apply a theme" header.
sentences: Right-click an empty spot on the desktop.
Click or tap a theme under "Apply a theme".
Follow the link to download more themes from the Windows Store.
Select the "Get more themes in the Store" link right under the "Apply a theme" header.
